version_description:
Thank you for downloading Billy, we really hope you get a clear insight in your fixed costs!

Despite all testing, a little bug slipped through our fingers unfortunately. Some users experienced a bug where they could only enter one decimal when entering the price of a subscription. This has been fixed now!

If you have any feedback how to make Billy even better, please send a message to info@billyapp.co!

Thank you for downloading Billy, we really hope you get a clear insight in your fixed costs!

Despite all testing, a little bug slipped through our fingers unfortunately. Some users experienced a bug where they could only enter one decimal when entering the price of a subscription. This has been fixed now!

If you have any feedback how to make Billy even better, please send a message to info@billyapp.co!

Say hello to Bobby!

Bobby is my older brother and will be my replacement on your homescreen. Bobby is a lot smarter than I am and he will help you keep track of your subscriptions even better and more accurately.

Please keep an eye on the App Store to get notified when Bobby's first big update will be available to download.

Say hello to Bobby!

Bobby is my older brother and will be my replacement on your homescreen. Bobby is a lot smarter than I am and he will help you keep track of your subscriptions even better and more accurately.

Please keep an eye on the App Store to get notified when Bobby's first big update will be available to download.

It's your lucky day!

We've listened to you and are excited to announce Bobby's very first big update.

This update offers support for multiple currencies!

Now you're finally able to manage the subscriptions that are billed in a different currency, woohoo :)

Supported currencies:
- Your default currency, based on your devices' region
- EUR
- USD
- GBP
- JPY
- AUD
- CHF
- CAD
- CNY
- NZD
- RUB

Questions, comments or missing a valuta? Please let us know through the in-app feedback button.

Team Bobby

It's your lucky day!

Team Bobby

Bobby here!

We've made some little tweaks here and there to optimize your experience:

- Added a same-day reminder option
- Added more custom subscription colors
- Added more currencies
- Subscriptions are now automatically removed after they've been expired
- Text in subscriptions overview is now capped correctly
- Fixed navigation bar issues on iOS 10
- The link to the terms and conditions page has been updated

Bobby here!

We've made some little tweaks here and there to optimize your experience:

- Added a same-day reminder option
- Added more custom subscription colors
- Added more currencies
- Subscriptions are now automatically removed after they've been expired
- Text in subscriptions overview is now capped correctly
- Fixed navigation bar issues on iOS 10
- The link to the terms and conditions page has been updated

A new year, the perfect opportunity to track all your subscriptions starting the first month of the year!

NEW: A lot more icons to choose from when creating a Custom Subscription

A new year, the perfect opportunity to track all your subscriptions starting the first month of the year!

NEW: A lot more icons to choose from when creating a Custom Subscription

I now also speak: Deutsch, Español, Italiano, Français.

Want to help us translate to your language? Email us at info@bobbyapp.co.

We're adding more services periodically to Bobby, be sure to check back every now and then. Here is a list of the latest additions:
Deezer, Google Play Music, Bank of America, Amazon AWS, Google Domains, American Express, Starz, Viaplay, Cox, Bear, Pinboard, Cloak, Setapp, Virgin Media, Loot Crate, My Geek Box, Boxcryptor, Orange, Runtastic, Bookmate, Backblaze, Ocado, BT (British Telecom), Match.com, Discover, Chase, Cancer Research UK, Firebase, The National Lottery and Hootsuite.

Be sure to email us at info@bobbyapp.co to ask for your service to be added.

Be sure to email us at info@bobbyapp.co to ask for your service to be added.

v1.5.9
- Date fix for iOS11 users

Keep your eyes peeled on the App Store. Bobby V2 is coming very soon!

v1.5.9
- Date fix for iOS11 users

Keep your eyes peeled on the App Store. Bobby V2 is coming very soon!

2.1.2
Thanks for patience guys! Fixed startup crash and scrolling crash. Thanks for the emails regarding this bug and to our dear friend Veljko for confirming the fix! It was a weird iOS bug that we couldn't reproduce on our end, but have managed to hunt down and squash thanks to all your help. Fixed a few other minor bugs!

- Added ILS, DOP, AED, ARS, RSD, and HUF currencies. Please let us know if you'd like any other currencies added!

2.1.2
Thanks for patience guys! Fixed startup crash and scrolling crash. Thanks for the emails regarding this bug and to our dear friend Veljko for confirming the fix! It was a weird iOS bug that we couldn't reproduce on our end, but have managed to hunt down and squash thanks to all your help. Fixed a few other minor bugs!

- Added ILS, DOP, AED, ARS, RSD, and HUF currencies. Please let us know if you'd like any other currencies added!

A ton of testing and debugging went into this update. Thanks for all the help and patience! Don't hesitate to keep emailing us if you run into problems on info@bobbyapp.co

v2.2.2
- Added tons of optimizations and fixed a lot of bugs! Special shout-out to our friend Bernd for helping us hunt down a nasty bug and squash it
- Fixed iCloud syncing to work between multiple devices at the same time
- New currencies: AED, SAR, TWD, UAH, QAR, DKK, COP, BYN, ILS, DOP, AED, ARS, RSD, and HUF (now alphabetically sorted)
- Added a 'YESTERDAY' label to subscriptions that were paid yesterday

Please contact us at info@bobbyapp.co if you are still dealing with any crashes or bugs. Your feedback helps us tremendously!

Hope you're all enjoying Bobby! Even more good stuff in this update:

v2.2.3
- Fixed duplicate subscriptions bug for iCloud sync users
- New currencies: PEN, THB, MYR, BGN, CLP
- Minor bug fixes and optimizations

Please contact us at info@bobbyapp.co if you are still dealing with any crashes or bugs. Your feedback helps us tremendously!

- Fixed missing icons bug for Bobby 1.0 users
- Fixed BGN currency; added UYU, IDR, and KWD currencies
- Minor bug fixes and optimizations

- Fixed missing icons bug for Bobby 1.0 users
- Fixed BGN currency; added UYU, IDR, and KWD currencies
- Minor bug fixes and optimizations

- Added VND currency
- Minor bug fixes and optimizations

- Added VND currency
- Minor bug fixes and optimizations

- Minor bug fixes and optimizations

- Added currencies: BGN, VND, UYU, IDR, KWD, PEN, THB, MYR, BGN, CLP, AED, SAR, TWD, UAH, QAR, DKK, COP, BYN, ILS, DOP, AED, ARS, RSD, and HUF
- Minor bug fixes and optimizations

- Added ability to change your default currency in the app's settings
- Added French translations
- Heavily optimized searching experience
- Fixed date/time format for non-U.S. users
- Tweaked passcode view animations (i.e. added a Touch ID button for when iOS bugs out)
- Minor bug fixes

v2.3.0
Added currencies: BGN, VND, UYU, IDR, KWD, PEN, THB, MYR, BGN, CLP, AED, SAR, TWD, UAH, QAR, DKK, COP, BYN, ILS, DOP, AED, ARS, RSD, and HUF

v2.3.0
Added currencies: BGN, VND, UYU, IDR, KWD, PEN, THB, MYR, BGN, CLP, AED, SAR, TWD, UAH, QAR, DKK, COP, BYN, ILS, DOP, AED, ARS, RSD, and HUF

- Completely refactored iCloud sync to be much more efficient and handle deleted subscriptions across multiple devices simultaneously
- Updated footer costs algorithms to take into account subscriptions whose firstBillDate is in the future
- Added CRF and XPF currencies

- Fixed bugs regarding reminders and iCloud syncing
- Minor improvements

- Minor improvements

Text and icon updates. We're back!
Text and icon updates. We're back!

Friends! I am super excited to bring you the latest 3.0 release. It has a ton of neat little improvements and new features. Here are the best ones:


- New font
- Native dark mode!
- More providers and services

We’re looking to update the app more again soon. Especially build a bigger database of providers and services. See you soon, enjoy the update!

Friends! I am super excited to bring you the latest 3.0 release. It has a ton of neat little improvements and new features. Here are the best ones:


- New font
- Native dark mode!
- More providers and services

We’re looking to update the app more again soon. Especially build a bigger database of providers and services. See you soon, enjoy the update!
- Fixed a critical bug which would prevent users from using the previous 'All-in-One pack' features.
- Fixed a critical bug which would prevent users from using the previous 'All-in-One pack' features.

- Fixed a bug which would prevent iCloud from syncing data to your device
- Elaborated on the differences between the previous 'All-in-One pack' and the new version
- Miscellaneous bug fixes

- Fixed a bug which would prevent iCloud from syncing data to your device
- Elaborated on the differences between the previous 'All-in-One pack' and the new version
- Miscellaneous bug fixes
- Fixed a bug which would cause duplicate subscriptions when deleting a subscription with iCloud Sync enabled
- Fixed a bug which would cause duplicate subscriptions when deleting a subscription with iCloud Sync enabled
